mobiles.name: shadow %s
mobiles.long_description: %s's shadow is here.
mobiles.description:
This dark form seems like it wants to get back at %s for keeping it
below them for so long....better not get in its way!

mobiles.name: special guard
mobiles.long_description: A special guard stands here, red with anger!
mobiles.description: Angry, very angry.

mobiles.name: bear
mobiles.long_description: A strong looking bear is here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: fiery red demon
mobiles.long_description: A red, fiery demon is looking around very angry.
mobiles.description: A big red demon, you feel like it is flaming.

mobiles.name: nightwalker
mobiles.long_description: A Nightwalker from the shadows lurks around.
mobiles.description:
This is a Nightwalker summoned from the shadows. Bloody eyes seem glowing.
This creature has a horible look.

mobiles.name: stalker guard
mobiles.long_description: A Stalker stands here, red with anger!
mobiles.description: Angry, very angry.

mobiles.name: squire
mobiles.long_description: A squire is stands here, with a smile in his face.
mobiles.description:
This noble squire is serving his apprenticeship in the ways of honor
and chivalry under his master.

mobiles.name: mirror
mobiles.long_description: A mirror image of someone is here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: undead
mobiles.long_description: an undead body is here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: lion
mobiles.long_description: A honoured looking lion is here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: wolf
mobiles.long_description: A wolf is here, looking very angrily.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: golem lesser
mobiles.long_description: A lesser golem is here.
mobiles.description: The golem appears to be made of some kind of clay, enchanted to come to life!.

mobiles.name: golem stone
mobiles.long_description: A stone golem stands ready to rend its master's enemies apart.
mobiles.description:
This is a large stone statue of a man. The statue stands eight feet tall
and looks powerful enough to rip off your head without straining.

mobiles.name: golem iron
mobiles.long_description: A huge iron statue of a man stands here.
mobiles.description:
This looks to be an iron statue of a human.  The statue stands a good
fifteen feet tall.  In fact it almost looks as if it can move.  You then glance
at it's eyes and notice with a shock that they are watching you.

mobiles.name: golem adamantite
mobiles.long_description: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
mobiles.description:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.

mobiles.name: lion
mobiles.long_description: A honoured looking lion is here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: shadow
mobiles.long_description: A dark summoned shadow is here.
mobiles.description: You see nothingness.

mobiles.name: dog
mobiles.long_description: A dog is here, waiting for the orders of its master.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: summoned earth elemental
mobiles.long_description: A huge part of earth stands here, preparing to move.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: summoned air elemental
mobiles.long_description: A dense circularly flowing gaseous form hanging here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: summoned fire elemental
mobiles.long_description: A balanced burning air is hanging here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: summoned water elemental
mobiles.long_description: A huge mass of ball-shaped water is hanging in the air.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: summoned lightning elemental
mobiles.long_description: A huge spark of electricity fizzles here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: animated weapon
mobiles.long_description: An animated weapon stands here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

mobiles.name: animated armor
mobiles.long_description: An animated armor stands here.
mobiles.description: You see nothing special about it.

objects.description: The corpse of %s is lying here.

objects.description: A grave stone for %s stands here.

objects.name: mushroom
objects.description: A delicious magic mushroom is here.

objects.name: ball light
objects.description: A bright ball of light shimmers in the air.

objects.name: spring
objects.description: A magical spring flows from the ground here.

objects.name: disc disk floating black
objects.description: A floating black disc hangs in the air.

objects.name: gate portal
objects.description: A shimmering black gate rises from the ground, leading to parts unknown.

objects.name: poncho
objects.short_description: a poncho from the carcass of %s
objects.description: A poncho from the cascass of %s lies here.

objects.name: steak
objects.description: A steak from %s.

objects.name: ranger staff
objects.description: There is a Ranger's Staff here on the ground.

objects.name: decanter endless water
objects.description: A small shiny decanter is on the floor.

extra_descriptions.description: The letters '%s' is carved on the upper surface of the decanter.

objects.name: silk adamantite backpack
objects.description: A very very shiny backpack is here.

extra_descriptions.description: The golden letters '%s' is carved on the side of the backpack.

objects.name: lion shield
objects.description: A shield with a head of lion shape on it lying on the floor.

objects.name: vial potion
objects.description: A vial of a potion is left here.

extra_descriptions.description: It's a glass vial used to hold magical potions. It looks fragile.

objects.name: potion silver
objects.description: A small silvery potion has carelessly been left here.

objects.name: potion golden
objects.description: A golden vial shines on the ground.

objects.name: potion swirling
objects.description: Some swirling liquid in a vial catches your attention.

objects.name: kassandra
objects.description: A mystical green stone is here, flying in the air.

objects.name: dress
objects.description: A dress of a white gown out of the bolt of silk lying here..

extra_descriptions.description:
This dress is made by dressmaker for Keeper who is after all work of hard
years guarding a retired lord.

objects.name: turkish rug
objects.description: A small rug with Turkish patterns is lying here.

objects.description: An enormous, huge GIRTH lies here, filling the room with its power.

objects.description: There is a shiny golden lance on the ground.

rooms.name: Limbo
rooms.description:
You are floating in a formless void, detached from all sensation of physical
matter, surrounded by swirling glowing light, which fades into the relative
darkness around you without any trace of edges or shadow.
   There is a "No Tipping" notice pinned to the darkness.
